import React from "react"; import { Link } from "react-router-dom"; import "./AuthLayout.css"; function Register() { const handleSubmit = (event) => { event.preventDefault(); // TODO: hook up registration submission }; return (

Create your account

Join Zottry to buy tickets, manage your wallet, and follow every draw.
